name: The 8th Int’l Conference on Soil and Water Conservation & Ecological Restoration
content: The 8th Int’l Conference on Soil and Water Conservation & Ecological Restoration (CSWCER 2024) will be held during November 15-17, 2024 in Sanya, China. This Conference will cover issues on Restoration Ecology, Forestry and Grass Ecology, Watershed Ecology and Management, Soil and Water Conservation, Monitoring and Assessment, Techniques and Methodology and other related fields. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods.
